pr_title: Advancement new stuff and refactor old bad names

timeline.bodyText: Maybe this should just be getParent?
timeline.author: Runemoro
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,7 +72,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_161 net/minecraft/advancement/Advancement
 			ARG 8 hidden
 		METHOD method_698 toJson ()Lcom/google/gson/JsonObject;
 		METHOD method_699 toPacket (Lnet/minecraft/class_2540;)V
+			ARG 1 buf
 		METHOD method_700 findParent (Ljava/util/function/Function;)Z

replies.bodyText: it is trying to find the parent and returns a boolean indicating if the parent is found.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't saver be serializer? Saver sounds like it's writing the json to the file or something, but the method returns a JsonElement.
timeline.author: Runemoro

replies.bodyText:
the saver is an object that has a method that converts a list of loot conditions to a json element.
the saver is a singleton, and i am not very sure why mojang even made the saver object, as the only used method is final and only a singleton is ever passed; the used method is only used in one place as well
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText:
converts a list of loot conditions to a json element


the saver is a singleton

That sounds exactly like a serializer...
replies.author: Runemoro

timeline.message:
Advancement new stuff and refactor old bad names

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>
